name: vuetify-docs
title: Vuetify Docs
description: Search all Vuetify components and open the official documentation directly from Raycast.
author: jeffnawroth

commands.name: search-components
commands.title: Search Components
commands.description: Search Vuetify components and open the documentation in the browser

commands.name: open-docs
commands.title: Open Vuetify Docs
commands.description: Opens the homepage of the Vuetify documentation

commands.name: search-documentation
commands.title: Search Documentation
commands.description: Search the Vuetify documentation and open it in the browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
